8500.name: Aden's Luminous Lure
8500.description: This luminous fishing lure can be used to catch Aden's Big Fish. It is used in Aden Territory by fishermen whose Fishing Mastery level is 19-21.

8501.name: Innadril's Luminous Lure
8501.description: This luminous fishing lure can be used to catch Innadril's Big Fish. It is used in Innadril Territory by fishermen whose Fishing Mastery level is 13-15.

8502.name: Goddard's Luminous Lure
8502.description: This luminous fishing lure can be used to catch Goddard's Big Fish. It is used in Goddard Territory by fishermen whose Fishing Mastery level is 25-27.

8503.name: Rune's Luminous Lure
8503.description: This luminous fishing lure can be used to catch Rune's Big Fish. It is used in Rune Territory by fishermen whose Fishing Mastery level is 22-24.

8504.name: Schuttgart's Luminous Lure
8504.description: This luminous fishing lure can be used to catch Schuttgart's Big Fish. It is used in Schuttgart Territory by fishermen whose Fishing Mastery level is 7-9.

8505.name: Green Luminous Lure - Low Grade
8505.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch fast low-grade fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8506.name: Green Luminous Lure
8506.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch fast fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8507.name: Green Colored Lure (High Grade)
8507.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch fast high-grade fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8508.name: Purple Luminous Lure - Low Grade
8508.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch fat low-grade fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8509.name: Purple Luminous Lure
8509.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch fat fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8510.name: Purple Luminous Lure (High Grade)
8510.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch fat high-grade fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8511.name: Yellow Luminous Lure - Low Grade
8511.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch ugly low-grade fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8512.name: Yellow Luminous Lure
8512.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch ugly fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8513.name: Yellow Luminous Lure (High Grade)
8513.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch ugly high-grade fish at night. The higher the lure'S-Grade, the more quickly the fish will take the bait. It cannot be used during the day.

8514.name: Remnants of Old Dwarves' Dreams
8514.description: This strange object may be dropped by the ghosts of ancient Dwarves as they find eternal rest.

8515.name: Charm of Courage: No Grade
8515.description: Allows on-the-spot resurrection during a Castle Siege, Clan Hall or Fortress Battle (level 1-19).

8516.name: Charm of Courage (D-Grade)
8516.description: Allows on-the-spot resurrection during a Castle Siege, Clan Hall or Fortress Battle (level 1-39).

8517.name: Charm of Courage (C-Grade)
8517.description: Allows on-the-spot resurrection during a Castle Siege, Clan Hall or Fortress Battle (level 1-51).

8518.name: Charm of Courage (B-Grade)
8518.description: Allows on-the-spot resurrection during a Castle Siege, Clan Hall or Fortress Battle (level 1-60).

8519.name: Charm of Courage (A-Grade)
8519.description: Allows on-the-spot resurrection during a Castle Siege, Clan Hall or Fortress Battle (level 1-75).

8520.name: Charm of Courage (S-Grade)
8520.description: Allows on-the-spot resurrection during a Castle Siege, Clan Hall or Fortress Battle (level 1-85).

8521.name: Seed: Sea Coba
8521.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Sea Coba. For best results, a level 74-84 character must plant it on a level 74-84 monster. Sowing

8522.name: Seed: Alternative Sea Coba
8522.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Sea Coba. For best results, a level 74-84 character must plant it on a level 74-84 monster. Sowing

8523.name: Seed: Twin Coba
8523.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Twin Coba. For best results, a level 77-87 character must plant it on a level 77-87 monster. Sowing

8524.name: Seed: Alternative Twin Coba
8524.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Twin Coba. For best results, a level 77-87 character must plant it on a level 77-87 monster. Sowing

8525.name: Seed: Great Coba
8525.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Great Coba. For best results, a level 80-90 character must plant it on a level 80-90 monster. Sowing

8526.name: Seed: Alternative Great Coba
8526.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Great Coba. For best results, a level 80-90 character must plant it on a level 80-90 monster. Sowing

8534.name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (Low Grade)
8534.description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, low quality accessory. Item - Adventurer Box

8535.name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (Medium Grade)
8535.description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, medium quality accessory. Item - Adventurer Box

8536.name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (High Grade)
8536.description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, high quality accessory. Item - Adventurer Box

8537.name: Adventurer's Box: B-Grade Accessory (Low Grade)
8537.description: Has a chance of containing a B-Grade, low quality accessory. Item - Adventurer Box

8538.name: Adventurer's Box: B-Grade Accessory (High Grade)
8538.description: Has a chance of containing a B-Grade, high quality accessory. Item - Adventurer Box

8539.name: Adventurer's Box: Hair Accessory
8539.description: Has a chance of containing a Raider's Hair Accessory. Item - Adventurer Box

8540.name: Adventurer's Box: Cradle of Creation
8540.description: Has a chance of containing a Cradle of Creation. Item - Adventurer Box

8541.name: Little Harness
8541.description: Outfit a baby pet with this harness by double-clicking. H5 Price

8542.name: Newbie Travel Token
8542.description: This token is used to help novice travelers move to various places. Characters under level 20 may redeem it at a Newbie Guide for travel between Talking Island Village, Dark Elven Village, Elven Village, Dwarven Village, Orc Village, and Kamael Village.

8543.name: Bead Parcel
8543.description: Take this parcel of woven beads to Warehouse Chief Yasheni in the Town of Schuttgart.

8544.name: Timora Orc's Head
8544.description: Severed head of the cowardly Timora Orc who betrayed his own tribe and joined the Ragna Orcs.

8545.name: Kasha Spider's Tooth
8545.description: This crooked spider's tooth was pulled out by hand during close combat.

8546.name: Horn of Baar Dre Vanul
8546.description: This smooth, flawless horn comes from Baar Dre Vanul, who inhabits the Immortal Plateau's Southern Region.

8547.name: Old Box
8547.description: An old box that can be caught by fishing in the Hot Springs area. If you double-click it, you can obtain the Certificate for Participation in a Clan Hall war in the Hot Springs at a certain rate of chance. Item - Hot Spring Fish

8548.name: Hot Springs Lure
8548.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch old box while fishing in the Hot Springs area in Goddard. Only characters with Fishing Mastery Level 20 or higher can haul in the old box.

8549.name: Bruin Lizardman Blood
8549.description: Blood obtained by slaying a Bruin Lizardman.

8550.name: Picot Araneid's Leg
8550.description: Leg obtained by slaying a Picot Araneid.

8551.name: Box of Cheerleading Gear Used to encourage victory.
8551.description: Box of Cheerleading Items for Cheering on the Red Devils. If you double-click it, it will randomly change to a different item. Item - Red Devil Support Box

8552.name: Mask of Spirits
8552.description: A hair accessory for the 2006 Halloween Event.

8553.name: Red Mask of Victory, Fabric
8553.description: The essential ingredient needed to make a Mask of the Red Devils. It can be sold at a regular store.

8554.name: Recipe: Red Mask of Victory (100%)
8554.description: For All Tribes. Recipe for a Mask of the Red Devils. Requires Create Common Item Skill Level 4.

8555.name: Echo Crystal - Viva Victory Korea
8555.description: Echo Crystal that plays the theme music of the World Cup. It disappears after one use. Item - Fight Song Crystal

8556.name: Dewdrop of Destruction
8556.description: Clicking the Dewdrop of Destruction causes the portrait to disappear. It cannot be dropped, but is deleted upon entering the Last Imperial Tomb. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo. Dewdrop of Destruction

8557.name: Blue Party Hat
8557.description: Three year anniversary hair accessory souvenir. Uses two hair accessory slots.

8558.name: Eva's Mark (Event)
8558.description: This item is designed for use in events only and cannot be exchanged or dropped.

8559.name: Diadem
8559.description: Hair accessory worn by a bride at her wedding ceremony. This hair accessory can only be worn by females only.

8562.name: Jester Hat
8562.description: A festive jester hat with a split top.

8563.name: Wizard Hat
8563.description: A Wizard Hat with a wide brim and bent tip.

8564.name: Dapper Cap
8564.description: A stylish cap with a visor.

8565.name: Romantic Chapeau
8565.description: An extravagant chapeau adorned with feathers.

8566.name: Iron Circlet
8566.description: Hair accessory for overseas event. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. This event item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

8567.name: Valakas Slayer Circlet
8567.description: The circlet presented to a player who has defeated Valakas.

8568.name: Antharas Slayer Circlet
8568.description: The circlet presented to a player who has defeated Antharas.

8569.name: Half Face Mask
8569.description: A mysterious costume accessory that covers half of the wearer's face.

8570.name: Event Gift Box
8570.description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.) Event Gift Box

8571.name: Event Gift Box
8571.description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.) Event Gift Box

8572.name: Event Gift Box
8572.description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.) Event Gift Box

8573.name: Event Gift Box
8573.description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.) Event Gift Box

8574.name: Event Gift Box
8574.description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.) Event Gift Box

8575.name: Event Gift Box
8575.description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.) Event Gift Box

8576.name: Apprentice's Staff (Event)
8576.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8577.name: Bone Club (Event)
8577.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8578.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8579.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8580.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8581.name: Long Sword (Event)
8581.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8582.name: Mace of Prayer (Event)
8582.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8583.name: Dark Elven Bow (Event)
8583.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8584.name: Long Bow (Event)
8584.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8585.name: Staff of Mana (Event)
8585.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8586.name: Bastard Sword (Event)
8586.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8587.name: Divine Tomb (Event)
8587.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8588.name: Single-Edged Jamadhr (Event)
8588.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8589.name: Tomahawk (Event)
8589.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8590.name: Poniard Dagger (Event)
8590.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used.

8591.name: Pike (Event)
8591.description: For the PC Cafe coupon event. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted. If one's PK count is 1 or more, it cannot be used. Polearm Multi-attack

8592.name: Weapon Exchange Coupon - No Grade
8592.description: An item that is used for the PC Cafe coupon event. An exchange coupon that can be used to exchange for a no grade weapon at Adventurers' Guide.

8593.name: Weapon Exchange Coupon (C-Grade)
8593.description: An item that is used for the PC Cafe coupon event. An exchange coupon that can be used to exchange for a D grade weapon at Adventurers' Guide.

8594.name: Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)
8594.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character of level 19 or below. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters. Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)

8595.name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade D)
8595.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters. Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)

8596.name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade C)
8596.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters. Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)

8597.name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade B)
8597.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 52 and 60. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters. Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)

8598.name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade A)
8598.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 61 and 75. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters. Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)

8599.name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade S)
8599.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used by a character whose level is 76 or higher. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters. Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)
